channel.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Journal has been renamed to Logbook. * There can now only be a max of 2 Neutral Socials that spawn in a game. * Report summary min. characters increased from 1 to 15. Please include as many details as possible when reporting. * Added the ability to purchase gold with money from your Steam Wallet.
### There are 4 Tiers: * $2.49 for 1,500 * $4.99 for 3,500 * $9.99 for 8,000 * $19,99 for 18,000
## Priest: * Removed day ability 'Bind Soul'. * The Priest now gives up their own life when they revive a player.

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

Still probably not as clean as a Trauma Patient is, but whatever.

Bos already said no to Squire which is Trauma Patient

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
robflop:

The Hunter also doesn’t revive anyone. The abilities are on entirely different spectrums.

My point is saying that was that having used your abilities is no reason to commit suicide.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
We’ll see how suiciding Priest works for now. And if it’s good it stays.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Nuclear’s idea was pretty great too, but this revive-and-die thing has been considered fine for forever

Still probably not as clean as a Trauma Patient is, but whatever.

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

This applies to every convertible class in the game. The hunter does not commit suicide after using both traps and both wolves so that isn’t a good reason.

The Hunter also doesn’t revive anyone. The abilities are on entirely different spectrums.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
1. The ability to talk to the dead is powerful. Don’t underestimate it
  2. There are classes such as CW that can keep you BD
  3. Doing actions that support BD makes the BD trust you. That trust is useful if you are converted and that lets you accuse people. As priest you can even blame the dead when your wrong.
  4. This applies to every convertible class in the game. The hunter does not commit suicide after using both traps and both wolves so that isn’t a good reason.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
You’d potentially rob Priest of a win by making them convertable again after resurrecting someone.

If Priest dies as a BD, she’ll win as a BD with her never-to-be-converted resurrected target.

Priest also serves no real role after resurrecting someone, her main ability’s been used.
It’s better to just let her die.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
So wait you just don’t like being converted?

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Yes. Kinda like a sheriff outing the unseen and being converted or the knight killing unseen or LITERALLY EVERY CONVETABLE CLASS IN THE GAME!!

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
Nuculear, so you just want Priest to be a “hey I’m here to revive one person then to be converted and probably lose cause I revived someone now who’s immune and can help BD win against unseen/cult”

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Yes but also dies after the revive meaning that the priest only represents 1 convert immune. Last patch it was 2 convert immunes and the patch before that it was 1 convert immune and 1 convertable.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
Priest is still convert immune lol that seems fine to me.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
My proposal was that the priest would be convert immune until the revive.

In other words = 1 unconvertable (priest) OR 1 unconvertable (revive) and 1 convertible (priest)

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
So basically you want more people who defy the point of the game

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes

item.description:
So basically you want more convert immune classes.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Add the word confirmed to my list and you will see that my argument still works

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
Unconvertables wasn’t the issue. The issue was 1 person too many being confirmed Blue dragon along with a revive and an invincible priest. Which has now been rectified while maintaining the priests buff. Priest is a little stronger than before but not strong enough to put him above all the other roles.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Sorry about that. Given that 1.0.5 BD was far too week they needed a buff. That buff was in the form of a buffed priest. That means that if the priest is then nerfed to be equal to or worse than 1.0.5 Priest then it would lead to the same problem as before.

1.0.5 priest was effectively = 1 unconvertable (the revive) and 1 convertible (the priest)
1.0.6 priest was effectively = 2 unconvertable (the priest and revived)
1.0.7 priest is currently = 1 uconvertable (the revive OR the priest)

1 unconvertable < 1 unconvertable + 1 convertable

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
You’d have to specify who “we” is. Your post only speaks for yourself… and most in this thread have so far expressed positive opinions in regards to the change. I also welcome it.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Magnasword2
item.description:
You don’t speak for me at least, This seems like a great solution to an issue.

Read full topic

item.description:
I feel like the priest committing suicide will either be a slight annoyance or game changing. Either way not what we want.
